Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>.
It seems that you have completed all
the work on Town Restoration 3.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone in town came together to
express our appreciation to you again.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks to you, <MYNAME>, I can run an
inn in town again! Niko and I are so
happy!
<PAGE>
Thank you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like the house you built for me.
Thanks.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
My rrrrestaurant is simply superrrrb!
Merci!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're getting things done the way only
you can, eh?
I respect that.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
And that brings me to this...
<MYNAME>, we all wanted to thank you in
some way.
<PAGE>
Someone brought up the idea of expanding
your farm.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You may know this already, but the land
on both sides of your farm is vacant.
<PAGE>
And we thought you'd be able to use it,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
So we cleared the land for you as a
surprise.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And now we have finished clearing the
area on the right of your farm.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The land on the right has space that can
be used for <RED>terraced fields</RED> and a rock
with a <RED>natural spring</RED>.
<PAGE>
You can grow high-quality crops in
terraced fields. And using the natural
spring you can water all of them!
<PAGE>
This is prime farming land, so please
go take a look at it later.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so glad to see it makes you happy!
And now I have a new town restoration
plan for you.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Using your new farmland, you should
be able to accomplish more than ever!
<PAGE>
Everyone is confident that you're the
person who can get it done!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I think I'll be heading home.
We're counting on you, <MYNAME>.

This is a town restoration plan that
everybody worked on!
I'll complete it no matter what!

Check the details of the plan from the
<RED>menu</RED>.
